sentence: US stock futures pointed to moderate gains on Wednesday as upbea t earnings from Dow component companies like United Technologies ( UTX ) and Procter & Gamble ( PG ) boosted sentiment, overshadowing concerns of a global economic slowdown.

Oil prices nudged higher after a sharp retreat from the previous session with global benchmark Brent crude up 1.04% and US crude West Texas Intermediate up 0.98% recently after official data suggested a slowdown in US shale output.

At 9 am, data are expected to show a 0.3% increase in the Federal Housing Finance Agency house price index for the month of November which represents a steady gain from the previous month, according to data compiled by Econoday.
At 10 am, forecasters see the Richmond Fed manufacturing report coming in at -3 for January following a -8 level in December.

In equities, shares of Soligenix ( SNGX ) were 24.5% higher pre-bell after the European Patent Office granted a new patent for the company's dusquetide and other related innate defense regulator analogs.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
